query: SELECT turmaId, COUNT(*) as total_eventos, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT tipoEvento) as tipos, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT local) as locais FROM eventos WHERE dataEvento IS NOT NULL GROUP BY turmaId LIMIT 10
